questions.question: 駅までバスで行って、それから電車に（＿）ください。
questions.hint:
～てください - polite request
駅(えき)、電車(でんしゃ)

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「乗ってください」 means "please get on."

  • 降りて - get off
  • 運んで - carry
  • 飛んで - fly

English: Please go to the station by bus, then get on the train.
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
The correct answer is 乗って.
「電車に乗る」 is the correct expression for taking a train.

questions.question: この料理は熱いので、（＿）食べてください。
questions.hint:
Adverb + verb - manner of action
料理(りょうり)、熱い、食べる

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「ゆっくり食べてください」 means "please eat slowly."

  • すぐに - immediately
  • 一緒に - together
  • たくさん - a lot
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
The correct answer is ゆっくり, which makes sense when food is hot.

questions.question: 宿題が（＿）前に、テレビを見ないでください。
questions.hint:
Verb (dictionary form) + 前に - before doing...
宿題(しゅくだい)、見る

explanation.correct:
Correct! 🎉
「終わる前に」 means "before finishing."

  • 始まる - begin
  • 忘れる - forget
  • 探す - search

English: Don’t watch TV before finishing your homework.
explanation.incorrect:
Incorrect
The correct answer is 終わる. It fits logically with doing something before the task is done.
